Raiamas nigeriensis (Daget, 1959)
USNM 339723
Nigeria: Mayo Gamgam (Fulani). Main river at Gashaka camp. This eventually drains to the river Taraba which joins the river Benue at just east of 10 deg E and north of 8 deg N. Altitude ca 340 m (1110 ft). Some specimens collected 31 March 1994, but some
1322231588

Raiamas nigeriensis (Daget, 1959)
USNM 338277
Nigeria: Mayo Santo (Fulani) or River Shuntan. Small Stream Inflow To Main River Near Gashaka Camp. This Eventually Drains To the River Taraba Which Joins the River Benue At Just East of 10 Deg E and North of 8 Deg N. Altitude ca 340 m (1110 Ft).
1320135315

Raiamas nigeriensis (Daget, 1959)
USNM 338821
Mayo Gam Gam (Fulani). At a Point Upstream of Gashaka Village Not Far From the Park Boundary. This Eventually Drains To the River Taraba Which Joins the River Benue At Just East of 10 Deg E and North of 8 Deg N. Altitude ca 610 m (2000 Ft)
1319325855

Raiamas nigeriensis (Daget, 1959)
USNM 338796
